ingredients.content: 1 lemon, zest only, no white pith
200 g Danish feta cheese, cut into pieces (2 cm)
100 g brown onion, cut into halves
½ - 1 long red chilli, deseeded if preferred
1000 g rump steak, cut into pieces (2-3 cm)
400 g canned kidney beans, rinsed and drained (weight is pre-draining)
2 - 3 sprigs fresh coriander, leaves only, for garnishing

preparations.content: Place lemon zest into mixing bowl and chop <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then repeat chopping <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>.

Add all remaining ingredients and mix <b>30 sec/speed 4<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and mix for a further <b>30 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Place garlic, onion and chilli into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add oil and all spices and sauté <b>3 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.
Add salt, tomato paste, tomatoes, sugar and rump steak and cook <b>13 min/100°C//speed 1<b>.
Add kidney beans and cook <b>2 min/100°C//speed 1<b>. Serve beef topped with lemon feta and coriander leaves.
